X.i.3.B.1.d
.
Special Account Called Secretary of the Treasury, Proceeds of Withheld Foreign Checks
31 U.S.C. 3329(b)(
4)
provides for a special account called
Secretary of the Treasury, Proceeds of Withheld Foreign Checks
, which was established to preserve the rights of
persons to whom awards had been made before October 9, 1940 (when the law prohibiting payments to listed countries was enacted), and
those subsequently taking residence in a listed country.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B - Adjudication Procedures for Foreign Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B
